title: Seven Special Offers-Are we mad???
content: Greater Albion Typefounders have just published details of our **seven** current special offers on Myfonts.com, including a 40% introductory discount on our three new 'Crewekerne' families on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235647/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/).
author: Rasendyll

comments.content: It's amaing what a difference one missing character can make! Link is now fixed-thanks!
Did you notice that kerning isnâ€™t turned on in the image promoting Bonavia? You might want to fix that.
